clue: I got bored by new metal bar
explanation: New resolves to N. I GOT, bored by N, is INGOT. A metal bar!
hints: The definition often goes at the start or the end of a clue. Look at those positions and see which could define a thing.
"Bored by" is telling us to put one part of the wordplay inside another.
In a cryptic clue, "new" can be used to represent the letter N.
